gpalm:source:deploy:diff.description: Deploy only the meta data that has changed between 2 commits from SFDX source into a Sandbox or production
examples:
$ sfdx gplam:source:deploy:diff --initialcommit arqergs --finalcommit asdfw4t --targetusername myOrg@example.com
  Files moved successfully

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

initialcommit.name: initialcommit
initialcommit.description: The initial commit that we want to find the diff of

finalcommit.name: finalcommit
finalcommit.description: The final commit that we want to find the diff of

includedelete.name: includedelete
includedelete.description: Flag to determine if delete should be included in the deployment, this will generate a destructive change package xml in the metadata deployment
